page.title: 12HOUSING.
page.content: THERE ARE 57 DWELLINGS IN THE AREA OF WHICH 15 ARE FARM HOUSES, 32 ARE COTTAGES, 7 ARE BUNGALOWS AND 3 ARE POST-WAR HOUSES.THERE ARE 12 SEMI- DETACHED HOUSES OF WHICH 8 ARE SITUATED ROUND LLANDDEWI RHYDDERCH VILLAGE GREEN. SLATE IS THE PREDOMINANT ROOFING MATERIAL BEING USED IN 33 PROPERTIES. OF THE REMAINDER 22 ARE TILED AND 2 ARE ROOFED WITH CORRUGATED SHEET. 34 BUILDINGS ARE RENDERED, 17 ARE CONSTRUCTED OF STONE, 4 OF BRICK, 1 OF WOOD AND 1 OF CORRUGATED SHEET. ALL HAVE CHIMNEYS. IT IS ESTIMATED THAT 39 HOUSES HAVE 8 ROOMS OR LESS AND THE REMAINING 18 HOUSES HAVE 9 ROOMS OR MORE.
